parametrized_description: A farmer sends corn to the city by either tractor or car. A tractor can carry TractorCapacity kilograms of corn while a car can carry CarCapacity kilograms of corn. Since tractors are very slow, the number of cars used must be at least MinimumCarMultiplier times the number of tractors used. If at least MinimumCornToSend kilograms of corn need to be sent to the city, minimize the total number of tractors and cars needed.

TractorCapacity.description: Capacity of one tractor in kilograms

CarCapacity.description: Capacity of one car in kilograms

MinimumCarMultiplier.description: Minimum multiplier for the number of cars relative to tractors

MinimumCornToSend.description: Minimum total amount of corn to send in kilograms

CornTractor.description: The amount of corn carried by tractors in kilograms

CornCar.description: The amount of corn carried by cars in kilograms

constraints.description: The number of cars used must be at least MinimumCarMultiplier times the number of tractors used.
Each tractor can carry TractorCapacity kilograms of corn.
Each car can carry CarCapacity kilograms of corn.
At least MinimumCornToSend kilograms of corn must be sent to the city.

objective.description: Minimize the total number of tractors and cars needed.
